Text: Thanks. More commonly known as "Bicycle Thieves" :)
there are at least 3 titles i seen..but since at least for now this is quite a rare torrent,better let it with release name,so it would be more easy to find..in searches

Yeah, I noticed you always leave the release name untouched, which is fine I guess. But I think people are much more likely to search for the film title than the release name. Just my opinion though :)

Also, I think people are more likely to search for "Mother" than "Madeo", and "The Illusionist" rather than "L'illusionniste", as those were the titles given for their releases in English-speaking countries. Meh.
thnx dude for such a great movie.....:-D
